extendedInfo.description: **The latest version of Evernote is required in order to use the Evernote Widget app**The Evernote Widget lets you go directly to core Evernote features right from your home screen.3 widget options:- List widget (Android 3.0+): Provides a scrollable list and display reminders. - Large widget: Same as the small widget, plus snippets of recently viewed notes.- Small widget: Create new text, snapshot and audio notes, and jump to the search screen.How to install:Once you install this app, tap and hold on the home screen, then select your preferred widget from the popup.The story behind this widget:We want every users to have the best Evernote experience possible. Unfortunately, if Evernote is installed on the SD card, then the widgets that comes with the app are unavailable. Thanks to this Evernote Widget application, anyone can take advantage of this time saving feature regardless of where Evernote is installed.Learn more about the widget: http://evernote.com/evernote/guide/android/#8

reviews.title: Looks great, Going try it out
reviews.comment: Look cool and useful, it may be much better to use than the actual note!
reviews.author: Hector Lee

reviews.title: Excellent updates!
reviews.comment: Thank you, everything working perfectly so far, now.
reviews.author: Eduardo Vaz de Mello

reviews.title: Resize Widget
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars, easily, if you could resize the widget on tablets! Other than that it does exactly what you would want it to do.
reviews.author: Brandon Bias

reviews.title: Don\'t ditch grid view please!
reviews.comment: Please don\'t loose the old widget. For half screen use 2x4 it fits much better than a list view . thanks :)
reviews.author: Matt B

reviews.title: Widget doesn\'t function
reviews.comment: Every day, I have to reinstall the 4x2 widget. It turns back into the 4x1 widget and won\'t function until I replace it.
reviews.author: Steven Roberts

reviews.title: Latest update not working
reviews.comment: Love the widget but the latest update doesn\'t work on my phone (early Galaxy model using 2.3.3). Set it up, it works for a bit then goes blank (all green)  on a restart.
reviews.author: Lori Dunn

reviews.title: Bug fix needed
reviews.comment: Having the same issue others are reporting where the launcher resets itself back to the green,  4x1 widget until the launcher is restarted.
reviews.author: Ryan Roach

reviews.title: New widget needs text color adjustment...
reviews.comment: ...like old widget does (light & dark themes). New widget only has white bg - FAR too bright for night time viewing!
reviews.author: Chuck Stone

reviews.title: Great widget
reviews.comment: I\'m really enjoying the new look!
reviews.author: Brandon Bay

reviews.title: Widget crashes
reviews.comment: Since the last update the widget just refuses to work. Please fix this, Evernote is one of my fav apps and I really want it back
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: One suggestion: please allow the notebook name to be shown on the new widget. I have 5 university units, and a widget for each, and being unable to identify each widget easily is somewhat inconvenient. Otherwise, completely amazing.
reviews.author: Asti Fletcher

reviews.title: Update is a feature-killer
reviews.comment: Why cancel the old widget column style? I personally find it more appealing to the eye. Why not add new representation mode alongside with the existing one and let user choose what suits them best? Why an update ought to kill what\'s good and proven? Very disappointed... =/
reviews.author: Val Komissarov

reviews.title: Nice try, but doesnt work as diary
reviews.comment: On my trips around Europe, Evernote app keep me organized,  I plan every trip in detail every day  as a diary, like: \"Day 0, Friday, July 2nd: arrival in Naples at 1325, NB use bus to hotel, dont forget atm\" and later on \"Day 10: Wed. Thursday, July 24th: The last supper!! Dont forget tickets!!\"  Worked perfect with Evernote for iOS (iphone) for several \"years\", and looks very promising on my brand new Sony xperia Z.  But no - the widget doesnt work at all since it doesnt sort in the way Evernote app does. What a shame, when looking at the widget right now, I  can read my notes as: \" Day 7 - Day 0 - Day 5 - Day 2 ...... \" completely out of order, and there is no option to fix this.  This problem is discussed with E. support, they say \"an upcoming release\".
reviews.author: Dryas anne

reviews.title: Excellent, but....
reviews.comment: Outstanding. Previous issues fixed.
reviews.author: Vimal Gorasia

reviews.title: Hhmm.....
reviews.comment: When I put the widget list, its just a green bar and all empty. There\'s no buttons for the quick notes or showing the notebook I picked. I really love the widget but its not working.
reviews.author: Pamela Gonzalez

reviews.title: Simply disfunctional
reviews.comment: How can software that is so popular be so bad?.. I have to recreate the widget on every boot.. Unacceptable for mature software not to function properly on a mainstream device. Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Nicholas Freedman

reviews.comment: Love this program. How it connects to everything& the flexibility
reviews.author: JoJo Bless

reviews.title: Business Notebook and Multi-language support lacking.
reviews.comment: I use Evernote primarily for business and find it frustrating that I\'m paying for a premium service yet not receiving non-premium features such as the list widget. I also change languages frequently on my device ( Korean on my LG Optimus G Pro) and when I do, the list view reverts to just a bar and must be removed and re-pinned to function properly each time I do. This is a huge inconvenience that prevents me from recommending this widget.
reviews.author: Michael Lacks

reviews.title: Easy to read, needs size options.
reviews.comment: While the new list view is a great improvement, it does need a resizing option. I have a Galaxy Tab with Go Launcher, and even the launcher\'s built in resizing function goes haywire. It worked fine with the old widgets. I tend to pack widgets for all my different notebooks on one screen, so being able to resize is essential.
reviews.author: Entorien Scriber

reviews.title: Needs calendar add on
reviews.comment: I love the app. It would be perfect if there was an easy calendar that could be synced within evernote.
reviews.author: Sumner Patton
